detail_desc: Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a tulle skirt. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the top with a decorative flower, and a flared skirt in several asymmetric layers of tulle. Satin lining.
Faux fur gilet with a button at the front. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.

Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted details, notch lapels with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted details, notch lapels with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Twill coat with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, diagonal front pockets, two inner pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in a jacquard knit with a fastening at the back, seam at the hips and a glittery tulle skirt. Partly lined.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a press-stud, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a press-stud, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and trousers with braces in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in woven fabric with braces that button at the front and elastication at the back of the waist and at the hems.
Dress in woven cotton with a collar, button placket and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Detachable imitation suede belt. Unlined.
Dress in woven cotton with a collar, button placket and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Detachable imitation suede belt. Unlined.

Set with a pair of dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Dungarees with concealed press-studs at the crotch, straps with a button on the shoulders,a kangaroo pocket with printed appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with lapped shoulders and long-sleeves.

Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an embroidered motif on the front. Straps that button at the front, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems. Jersey lining at the top.

Short-sleeved shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a nepped texture. Unlined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a nepped texture. Unlined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, reflective details and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, reflective details and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Imitation leather jacket with quilted details, a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Imitation leather jacket with quilted details, a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a fabric appliqué on one sleeve. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining. Polyester filling.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
